title: The ‘Adrenaline Rush’ of Directing the Tour de France Femmes
content:
We speak with Marion Rousse, who has been in charge of the weeklong race since its debut in 2022: 'There’s not a single stage where you can relax.'

Read the full article at The ‘Adrenaline Rush’ of Directing the Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
